properties.Name: NonCompetitionEmployeeAgreement

Columns.Name: ContractId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Contract.

Columns.Name: CompetitionCovenantsSection
Columns.Description:
This section specifies the non-compete restrictions placed on the employee by the employer.

This section specifies:

-  The length of restrictions
-  The subjects of restriction
-  Confidentiality period

Columns.Name: AtWillSection
Columns.Description: This section specifies that either party may terminate the employment at any time for any legal reason.

Columns.Name: AccountingForProfitsSection
Columns.Description: This section specifies that the employee must repay the employer for losses caused by breach of the agreement.

Columns.Name: ReasonablenessOfRestrictionsSection
Columns.Description: This section indicates that both the employer and employee agree that the restrictions agreed to are reasonable.

Columns.Name: BurdenAndBenefitSection
Columns.Description: This section specifies that a third party that becomes a party to the agreement is covered by it.

Columns.Name: SeverabilitySection
Columns.Description: This section specifies that in the condition that a section of the agreement is found to be invalid, the rest of the agreement will be in effect.

Columns.Name: GoverningLawSection
Columns.Description: This section specifies the state whose law will be used to interpret and enforce the agreement.

Columns.Name: EntireAgreementSection
Columns.Description: This section specifies that the agreement is the final agreement between the parties and supersedes any prior agreements, discussions, letters etc.

Columns.Name: NoWaiverSection
Columns.Description: This section specifies that the waiver of a single condition of the agreement does not constitute a waiver in other cases.

Properties.Description: An agreement between an Employer and Employee not to compete for a set period under within specified restrictions.
